symptoms: Central AC not cooling properly; runs continuously, house temperature won't drop below 78°F set at 72°F. Condenser running but quieter. No ice. Refrigerant topped off 6 months ago. Energy bills up 30%.

root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: Low refrigerant after recent top-off; reduced cooling capacity.
Quieter condenser operation; insufficient cooling despite running.
Reduced airflow across condenser coil leading to inefficient heat exchange.

recommended_actions.step: Inspect refrigerant lines and connections for leaks using electronic leak detector and soapy bubble test.
recommended_actions.why: Identify and repair any refrigerant leaks to restore proper cooling and prevent further loss.

recommended_actions.step: Measure superheat and subcooling to assess system refrigerant charge and compressor performance.
recommended_actions.why: Determine if refrigerant charge is optimal and compressor is operating within specifications.

recommended_actions.step: Check compressor amperage draw and winding resistance.
recommended_actions.why: Evaluate compressor electrical condition and identify potential motor failure.

recommended_actions.step: Visually inspect condenser coil for dirt, debris, or damage; clean if necessary.
recommended_actions.why: Ensure proper airflow across the coil for efficient heat exchange.

safety_notes: Refrigerant can cause frostbite; wear appropriate PPE.
Recover refrigerant properly to prevent environmental damage.
Electrical shock hazard; disconnect power before servicing electrical components.
Ensure proper ventilation when working with refrigerants.
Capacitors can hold a dangerous electrical charge; discharge before handling.
disclaimers: Cost and time estimates are approximate and may vary based on the specific issue and local labor rates.
Additional diagnostics may be required to pinpoint the exact cause.
No warranty or TSB references were found.

confidence.assessment: Insufficient evidence to definitively diagnose the root cause of the AC malfunction.

customer_readiness_check.short_reason: Confidence is below threshold. More data is needed to increase diagnostic certainty and provide a reliable solution for the customer. Potential safety risks also need more emphasis.
